targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(time_column),
  value1
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

select ts_first_occurrence::date::text
from crash.spec_mv
WHERE sig_v2 = decode('$sig_v2', 'hex')

select max(ts)::date::text
from crash.crash
INNER JOIN crash.spec on crash.spec.id = crash.crash.spec_id
WHERE crash.spec.sig_v2 = decode('$sig_v2', 'hex')

SELECT count(*)
FROM crash.crash
INNER JOIN crash.spec ON spec_id = crash.spec.id
WHERE sig_v2 = decode('$sig_v2', 'hex')
AND $__timeFilter(ts)

--SELECT count(*)

select
  count(*)
from (
  SELECT
    DISTINCT ON(cluster_id)
    grafana.ts_cluster.*
  from crash.crash
  INNER JOIN crash.spec ON spec_id = crash.spec.id
  INNER JOIN grafana.ts_cluster ON crash.crash.report_id = grafana.ts_cluster.report_id
  WHERE sig_v2 = decode('$sig_v2', 'hex')
  AND $__timeFilter(crash.crash.ts)
  order by grafana.ts_cluster.cluster_id, grafana.ts_cluster.ts desc
) as affected_clusters;

SELECT 'v' || split_part(crash.crash.ceph_version, '-', 1) as metric, count(*)
FROM crash.crash
INNER JOIN crash.spec ON spec_id = crash.spec.id
WHERE sig_v2 = decode('$sig_v2', 'hex')
AND $__timeFilter(ts)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  $__time(time_column),
  value1
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

panels.description: The stack trace of the crash without function offsets

value.title: Search this function in other crashes

targets.rawSql:
select UNNEST(stack_names) as functions
from crash.spec
WHERE sig_v2 = decode('$sig_v2', 'hex')

panels.title: Stack Names (Most recent call first)

SELECT
  $__time(time_column),
  value1
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

SELECT $__timeGroup(ts, '1d', 0) as time, count(*)
FROM crash.crash
INNER JOIN crash.spec ON spec_id = crash.spec.id
WHERE sig_v2 = decode('$sig_v2', 'hex')
AND $__timeFilter(ts)
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(ts, '1d', 0)

SELECT
  $__time(time_column),
  value1
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

-- cluster info from a report that contains a related crash
with
cluster_info as (
	select
	  DISTINCT ON(cluster_id)
	  grafana.ts_cluster.*
	from crash.crash
	INNER JOIN crash.spec ON spec_id = crash.spec.id
	INNER JOIN grafana.ts_cluster ON crash.crash.report_id = grafana.ts_cluster.report_id
	WHERE sig_v2 = decode('$sig_v2', 'hex')
	--AND $__timeFilter(crash.crash.ts)
),
recent_versions as (
	-- the latest metadata for each cluster
	select gm.report_id, array_agg(distinct(gm.value)) recent_versions, gc.cluster_id 
	from grafana.metadata gm inner join grafana.ts_cluster gc on gm.report_id = gc.report_id 
	where gm.report_id in (
		select max(report_id) 
		from grafana.ts_cluster 
		where cluster_id in --('2133741d-5f4e-4afd-ace3-2760b255d7c7', '0b54fcbf-aa86-4154-8290-7767a733a824')
				( select ci.cluster_id
				from cluster_info ci
				)
		group by cluster_id
		)
	and attr = 'ceph_version_norm'
	group by gm.report_id, gc.cluster_id 
)
select ci.*, rv.recent_versions 
from  
recent_versions rv
inner join cluster_info ci on rv.cluster_id = ci.cluster_id
order by ci.cluster_id, ci.ts desc

/*
select
  DISTINCT ON(cluster_id)
  grafana.ts_cluster.*
from crash.crash
INNER JOIN crash.spec ON spec_id = crash.spec.id
INNER JOIN grafana.ts_cluster ON crash.crash.report_id = grafana.ts_cluster.report_id
WHERE sig_v2 = decode('$sig_v2', 'hex')
AND $__timeFilter(crash.crash.ts)
order by grafana.ts_cluster.cluster_id, grafana.ts_cluster.ts desc
*/

SELECT
  $__time(time_column),
  value1
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

panels.description: Crashes with the same specification/fingerprint that occurred between ${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD} and ${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD}. Click on a crash_id to see more details (like its backtrace).

value.title: See other crashes with the same sig_v1

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
--crash.crash.*
  crash.crash.id,
  crash.crash.spec_id,
  crash.crash.crash_id,
  crash.crash.report_id,
  crash.crash.ts::text,
  encode(crash.crash.sig_v1, 'hex') sig_v1,
  crash.crash.process_name,
  crash.crash.entity_name,
  crash.crash.ceph_version,
  crash.crash.utsname_hostname,
  crash.crash.utsname_sysname,
  crash.crash.utsname_release,
  crash.crash.utsname_version,
  crash.crash.utsname_machine,
  crash.crash.os_name,
  crash.crash.os_id,
  crash.crash.os_version_id,
  crash.crash.os_version,
  crash.crash.assert_file,
  crash.crash.assert_line,
  crash.crash.assert_thread_name,
  crash.crash.assert_msg,
  crash.crash.io_error,
  crash.crash.io_error_devname,
  crash.crash.io_error_path,
  crash.crash.io_error_code,
  crash.crash.io_error_optype,
  crash.crash.io_error_offset,
  crash.crash.io_error_length
FROM crash.crash
INNER JOIN crash.spec ON spec_id = crash.spec.id
WHERE crash.spec.sig_v2 = decode('$sig_v2', 'hex')
AND $__timeFilter(crash.crash.ts)
ORDER BY crash.crash.ts DESC

panels.title: Crashes

where spec_id = (select id from crash.spec where sig_v2 = decode('$sig_v2', 'hex'))
